headline: The Oil Tycoon and the Philosopher Threatening Big Oil’s Carbon Capture Plans
summary: Exxon Mobil Occidental Petroleum  and other oil giants are expected to receive billions of dollars of incentives to collect and bury carbon emissions.  Texas oil billionaire Ben “Bud” Brigham and pro-fossil-fuels activist  Alex Epstein  want to turn off the tap.  Brigham, a serial entrepreneur and libertarian from Austin, is urging President Trump and the Republicans who are considering slashing a host of energy incentives to go further and nix tax credits for carbon capture.
